contest-event.event-date: March 11, 2018 D Midlands Area (Second Section) Midlands Area (Second Section) 20 Test Piece Contest Midlands Area midlands-area-second-section National Championship of Great Britain (Second Section Final) From 1985 to 1993 this contest was split into North and South Areas. Please refer to the 'Old Contests' section on http://brassbandresults.co.uk/contests/MIDLANDS-AREA/ for the results. Midlands Second Ex Terra Lucem Bedworth Civic Hall, Bedworth, Warwickshire, England, UK March 15, 2017, 10:06 p.m. March 12, 2018, 11:44 a.m. 1 Hucknall and Linby Mining Community Brass Paul Whyley 2 Rolls Royce (Derby) Band Graham Cardwell 3 Tintwistle Band Sarah Groarke-Booth 4 Foss Dyke Band Michael Howley 5 Bakewell Silver Band Jim Henson 6 Stourport-on-Severn Brass Band Oliver Wilson 7 City of Coventry Brass Band Stephen Cooper 8 Avonbank (Evesham) Band Colin Hogg 9 Ireland Colliery Chesterfield Band Lindon Bolt 10 Daventry Brass Ken Ewer
